backend/main.mo: Defines data types and comparison utilities for programs, KPIs, and priorities, and includes authorization mixin setup.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence indicators.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides textual summaries for various frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React application by mounting main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, user profile loading, theming, and conditional rendering of login, setup, or dashboard.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Dashboard overview component that fetches metrics and renders charts, stats, and progress data for programs and KPIs.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Reusable confirmation dialog component for delete operations using alert-dialog UI components.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying attribution text with a link and heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main app header with theme toggle, user profile display, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/KpiFormDialog.ts: Dialog form for creating or editing a KPI, mapping form inputs into backend-compatible payloads.
frontend/src/components/KPIsTab.tsx: Displays and filters KPI data with search, status, period, and team filters, plus edit and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Forces users to input name and role on first use and saves the profile.
frontend/src/components/ProgramCalendarT: Shows a calendar and lists programs active on a selected date with status and priority badges.
frontend/src/components/ProgramFormDialo: Dialog for creating or updating a program, including PIC selection, dates, status, and priority.
frontend/src/components/ProgramsTab.tsx: Displays and filters program data with search, sorting, badges, and CRUD dialogs.
frontend/src/components/ReportsTab.tsx: Generates program and KPI reports with filtering options and CSV export.
frontend/src/components/TeamMemberFormDi: Dialog for creating or updating team members with validation and form handling.
frontend/src/components/TeamMembersTab.t: Lists team members with search, filtering, and options to add, edit, or delete entries.
Admin-only interface for viewing users and updating their roles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity state loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, programs, KPIs, and admin data via an actor interface.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables, dark mode styles, and utility classes for gradients, animations, and card effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app and wraps it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with tabbed navigation, showing different sections based on user role and selected tab.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a login screen allowing users to authenticate via Internet Identity with loading feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content scanning, extended theme settings for colors, radius, shadows, animations, and includes typography, container query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata including features, new feature requests, versions, and architectural/issue placeholders for a program calendar project.
